channel.title: [317] What .java file controls new Player sign-ups and starter items?
channel.description:
Say I am a [b]new player[/b] and type any user name or password into the client to login, and then the ".dat" or ".txt" file is created and bla bla bla...
What part of which .java file is controlling all of this? I can't find it.
Helps well appreciated

item.title: [317] What .java file controls new Player sign-ups and starter items?
item.dc:creator: @Server_Creator_Brian Server Creator Brian
item.source: [317] What .java file controls new Player sign-ups and starter items?

item.title: [317] What .java file controls new Player sign-ups and starter items?
item.dc:creator: @sw0o0sh sw0o0sh
item.description:
@sw0o0sh wrote:

Server Creator Brian:

No, i don’t think you will find anything on it in there, but that handles everything in the server.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: November 24, 2009, 06:25:13 am[/size][hr]Try client.java.

Yeah, ended up being in client.java, line 11008
Did what I needed to do.

Thanks

Read full topic
